html:
I was reviewing some code today and came across an interesting observation. Why do we have such a long pl_true implementation? Can't it be represented simply by the function below?
def pl_true(expr, model):
    result = expr.subs(model)
    if isinstance(result, BooleanFunction):
        return None
    return bool(result)
Probably a few corner cases will have to handled, but the idea essentially remains the same.
text: Probably a few corner cases will have to handled, but the idea essentially remains the same.
